perks.name: Gambling Catcher
perks.desc: **percent%** chance of **tripling** cats on catch, but **triple_none**% chance of getting **no** cats on catch.

perks.name: Pack Catcher - Wooden
perks.desc: **percent%** chance of getting a **wooden pack** on catch.

perks.name: Pack Catcher - Stone
perks.desc: **percent%** chance of getting a **stone pack** on catch.

perks.name: Pack Catcher - Bronze
perks.desc: **percent%** chance of getting a **bronze pack** on catch.

perks.name: Pack Catcher - Silver
perks.desc: **percent%** chance of getting a **silver pack** on catch.

perks.name: Pack Catcher - Gold
perks.desc: **percent%** chance of getting a **gold pack** on catch.

perks.name: Pack Catcher - Platinum
perks.desc: **percent%** chance of getting a **platinum pack** on catch.

perks.name: Bright Catcher
perks.desc: **percent%** chance of prisms boosting catches by **two rarity levels**.

perks.name: Purrcise Catcher
perks.desc: Getting **Purrfection or All The Same** times on catch **triples** cats recieved.

perks.name: Time Manipulator
perks.desc: **percent%** chance of adding **5 minutes** to catnip timer on catch.

perks.name: Voting Booster
perks.desc: Your vote streak **(timer_add_streak)** boosts catnip duration.

perks.name: Rainy Catcher
perks.desc: **percent%** chance of starting a rain with **10** cats.

perks.name: Speedrunner
perks.desc: The first **percent** cats cought each level always **double**.
